name: Salam
what_you_do: Roger Salam is the Chairman and founder of The Winner’s Circle, a mastermind forum for top speakers and entrepreneurs, and the founder of Real Estate Web Academy, an educational community for real estate investors.
who_you_serve: Roger serves entrepreneurs, real estate investors, and individuals seeking financial freedom through education and networking.
signature_programs: Mastermind Your Way to Millions, Secrets of the Real Estate Millionaires
current_projects: Annual Best-Selling Author® Golden Gala and Awards Ceremony
social_proof: Delivered over 3700 professional talks, co-author of multiple books, graduate of UCLA.
bio: Delivered over 3700 professional talks, co-author of multiple books, graduate of UCLA.
